urls.title: EXCLUSIVE: Chinese virologist accuses Beijing of coronavirus cover-up, flees Hong Kong: 'I know how they treat whistleblowers'
urls.description: Li-Meng Yan told Fox News that she believes China knew about the coronavirus well before it claimed it did. She says her supervisors also ignored research she was doing that she believes could have saved lives.

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump "We don't have much time left!" Wakeup and focus on the virus! Mankind is in great danger because of this CCP Bio weapon!
Do not expect for herd immunity and vaccine under current situation.
Terminate CCP to stop the covid virus!
